name: OpenAddresses
tagline: A Free and Open collection of addresses from around the world.
body: ### Welcome to OpenAddresses We're collecting every single address in the world, associating it with a point on Earth, and letting you download the whole thing as a CSV. ### Why do this? Addresses are a helpful dataset ### Where can I get data? Right now we're collecting and collating data sources. We don't have a compiled dataset yet, but you can check out our list of [data sources](https://github.com/osmlab/addresses/tree/master/sources) and add your own. ### How can I help? You can help immediately by filling out this form. If you're comfortable with GitHub, you can find your local data set and [open an issue](https://github.com/osmlab/addresses/issues/new?labels=data-sources) with information about how to access it and what area is covered. ### Authors and Contributors This is based on a Google Spreadsheet started by @iandees, with subsequent help by @lxbarth, @tlpinney, @ingalls, @tmcw, and @mvexel.
note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
